llvm-use-new-mlir-op-builder.description:
Description

llvm-mlir-op-builder
Checks for uses of MLIRâ€™s old/to be deprecated
OpBuilder::create<T>
form
and suggests using
T::create
instead.
Example
builder
.
create
<
FooOp
>
(
builder
.
getUnknownLoc
(),
"baz"
);
Transforms to:
FooOp
::
create
(
builder
,
builder
.
getUnknownLoc
(),
"baz"
);
llvm-use-new-mlir-op-builder.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
